location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 87 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter was sent with a duplicate of the Resident's Extraordinary Expenses (IOR/R/15/1/3, p 131 1) and monthy accounts for May to October. The letter outlines details (including costs) of moving the stable in Bushire to a new site. The arrival (and subsequent departure to Bengal) of the ElizaPacket (under command of Captain John Ritchie) is recorded. It is noted that a sepoy of the Bushire Factory Guard who had deserted was replaced with a sepoy from the Scorpion'sdetachment. The Company's debt to the Resident is noted.
